body_html:
This issue is GOOGLE_L4T Marco is 'not defined' in gcc on Jetson(build on Jetson). So, it will enter these section, then error happened.
aarch64 is defined, GOOGLE_L4T is not defined.
A simple fix is here, but not good. This just a fix, change GOOGLE_L4T Marco may needed.
change
tensorflow/contrib/lite/kernels/internal/optimized/depthwiseconv_uint8_3x3_filter.h
tensorflow/contrib/lite/kernels/internal/optimized/depthwiseconv_uint8.h

// Enable for arm64 except for the Nvidia Linux 4 Tegra (L4T) running on
// Jetson TX-2. This compiler does not support the offsetof() macro.

#if defined(__aarch64__) && !defined(GOOGLE_L4T) 
to
#if defined(__aarch64__) && !defined(GOOGLE_L4T)
#include <stddef.h>

Because GOOGLE_L4T is not defined, so it will not enter these section.
body_text:
This issue is GOOGLE_L4T Marco is 'not defined' in gcc on Jetson(build on Jetson). So, it will enter these section, then error happened.
aarch64 is defined, GOOGLE_L4T is not defined.
A simple fix is here, but not good. This just a fix, change GOOGLE_L4T Marco may needed.
change
tensorflow/contrib/lite/kernels/internal/optimized/depthwiseconv_uint8_3x3_filter.h
tensorflow/contrib/lite/kernels/internal/optimized/depthwiseconv_uint8.h
// Enable for arm64 except for the Nvidia Linux 4 Tegra (L4T) running on
// Jetson TX-2. This compiler does not support the offsetof() macro.

#if defined(__aarch64__) && !defined(GOOGLE_L4T) 
to
#if defined(__aarch64__) && !defined(GOOGLE_L4T)
#include <stddef.h>

Because GOOGLE_L4T is not defined, so it will not enter these section.
body:
This issue is GOOGLE_L4T Marco is 'not defined' in gcc on Jetson(build on Jetson). So, it will enter these section, then error happened.
__aarch64__ is defined, GOOGLE_L4T is not defined.
A simple fix is here, but not good. This just a fix, change GOOGLE_L4T Marco may needed.
change 
tensorflow/contrib/lite/kernels/internal/optimized/depthwiseconv_uint8_3x3_filter.h
tensorflow/contrib/lite/kernels/internal/optimized/depthwiseconv_uint8.h
```
// Enable for arm64 except for the Nvidia Linux 4 Tegra (L4T) running on
// Jetson TX-2. This compiler does not support the offsetof() macro.

#if defined(__aarch64__) && !defined(GOOGLE_L4T) 
to
#if defined(__aarch64__) && !defined(GOOGLE_L4T)
#include <stddef.h>
```
Because GOOGLE_L4T is not defined, so it will not enter these section.
